title: Into a World of Colour
brief_description: Since the beginning of cinema, filmmakers experimented with colour and sound by hand-tinting frames and providing orchestral accompaniments. But it wasn’t until the early 20th century that ‘talkies’ truly changed the industry and glorious Technicolor ushered in the first golden age of cinema.

constellations_primary.name: Into a world of colour
constellations_primary.description: Filmmakers have been using colour as a method of storytelling since the first moving pictures. Colour can be used to signify emotion, intensify drama or to create a strong visual aesthetic.
